# Tests: Retirement rates


```{r}
#| label: setup

GROOT <- rprojroot::find_root(rprojroot::has_file(".git/index"))
source(fs::path(GROOT, "data-raw", "R", "setup.R"))

```

```{r}

retire_rates <- readRDS(fs::path(DIRS$work, "retirement_rates.rds"))

```


```{r}
#| label: tests
#| echo: true

print("no tests yet for retirement_rates")
test_results <- TRUE

```


```{r}

fpath <- fs::path(DIRS$work, "tests_retirement_rates.csv")

if (fs::file_exists(fpath)) {
  fs::file_delete(fpath)
}

tibble(
  test = "all tests_retirement_rates tests passed",
  passed = test_results # all_tests_passed(test_results)
) |>
  readr::write_csv(fpath)

```
